activities: Huddle Inc is a subsidiary of Ninian Solutions Ltd (t/a Huddle)located in London UK.  Huddle is a platform for sharing and collaborating on content, securely, in the cloud.  Huddle may collect personally identifiable information and data-sensitive files to facilitate a client's use of the Huddle product. Huddle is likely to process contact information of individual representatives of the businesses it is dealing with, including, without limitation, names, addresses, work phone numbers, work email addresses.   Therefore in the course of its business, Huddle Inc may receive information received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland and will use such information for the purposes of providing and improving Huddle's services, entering into contracts, providing customer support, and enforcing its Subscriber Agreements and Terms of Use.  Huddle also collects personal information from its employees to provide human resources services, to comply with applicable laws, and to provide internal security services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data submitted to Huddle by customers, Huddle employees personal data processed in the course of their employment offline and on line.
recoursemech: Huddle Inc has retained ICDR/AAA for dispute resolution
